thread.title: TV | The Leftovers

author: entertainment.ie
title: TV | The Leftovers
text: The cult drama hit following the lives of the Garvey family, who live in a world where 2% of the population disappeared in an instant dubbed The Sudden Departure, returns to Sky Atlantic for its second season. Upping sticks from their turmoil in New York, the new Garvey family unit heads to the town of Jarden, Texas, the only place with a report of zero departed, to start a new life but of course, things aren't going to run smoothly.
